RE TW Templates Cc The ARP All receipts and ITDEL Interruptible Delivery Points are each used on all IT agreements The other templates are no longer used DL Original Message From Trevino Linda Sent Wednesday November PM To Lee Dennis Donoho Lindy Lohman TK Brown Elizabeth Betancourt Ramona Cc Brady Andy Licciardo Jeanne Subject TW Templets Below is a list of templets in the current CBS system that are not tied to any contracts nor are they on the alternate point contractmatrix list Do we still need any of these templets ARP All receipts ENRAD Enrate NNGTW Del FARLSJ Firm Alt Rec Less San Juan FTS EOT FTS EOT Receipt POIS HUB HUB ITDEL Interruptible Delivery Points MOBWA MobilWaha Straddle receipt points NLPR North La Plata Receipts PNRALT PNR Alt Firm Receipts RICHKEY RichardsonKeystone Straddle TITLE TR Title Transfer Agreement POI Please let me know ASAP Thanks Linda

RE TW CBS Production Contract Cc The contract has been cleaned up to remove the groups outside the path Let me know if you need anything else DL Original Message From Betancourt Ramona Sent Wednesday March PM To Lee Dennis Cc Donoho Lindy Subject FW TW CBS Production Contract Dennis Please see the note below from Lindy Can yuo pull the contract get it to Lindy for review We may need to clean up this contract Thanks Ramona Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Thursday March AM To Lindberg Lorraine Cc Betancourt Ramona Subject FW TW CBS Production Contract Lorraine This is Southerns Gallup contract Ive looked at our yellow file we keep down here and the original agreement only allowed alt RPs DPs within the path in the direction of flow at the discounted rate Then I see an amendment to allow them alternate DPs at the CA Border I dont see anything else here Are you aware of any deals that allowed them to use alt RPs in East of Thoreau Ramona Can you ask Dennis to look in Envision or pull the official contract file for you and check to see if there are any other amendments Thanks Lindy Original Message From Betancourt Ramona Sent Monday March PM To Donoho Lindy Subject TW CBS Production Contract Lindy While testing the TMS nomination and scheduling processes that Interface into the new CMS system I have found a TW Firm contract with Southern Energy Inc that was set up back in May or June of which has several alt receipt templates that are outside the primary path The primay path for this contract is San Juan Bloomfield receipts to Socal Needles as primary delivery It shows up in production with alt receipt groups in Central West Texas and Panhandle Is this correct Thanks Ramona
CR Cc Should Cr The Northwest Capacity in the Hub be and FTS contract or should it be an Administrative contract It is currently set up as an FTS Please advise Dennis P Lee ETS Gas Logistics

Re FW Contract Changes for Cc Lorraine Please also send these to Dale and Michelle Martha Cormier That way if Im out it wont get lost in the shuffle Dennis Lorraine Lindberg AM To Dennis LeeET NRON cc Subject FW Contract Changes for Dennis This request is ok with Marketing Forwarded by Lorraine LindbergETSEnron on AM Barwatt Joseph on AM To cc Subject FW Contract Changes for Original Message From Barwatt Joseph Sent Monday January AM To Cc Burton Monty Palacio Nikki Subject FW Contract Changes for Effective please change firm primary receipt MDQ as follows OLD NEW GPM Artesia West Pool Central Pool NNG Haley TOTAL MDQ Thanks Joe barwatt Gas Scheduling PGE National Energy Group and any other company referenced herein that uses the PGE name or logo are not the same company as Pacific Gas and Electric Company the regulated California utility Neither PGE National Energy Group nor these other referenced companies are regulated by the California Public Utilities Commission Customers of Pacific Gas and Electric Company do not have to buy products from these companies in order to continue to receive quality regulated services from the utility

Capacity Requests for TW Cc Effective immediately the contracts group will change the procedure for capacity requests for Transwestern A note will continue to be sent via Lotus Notes showing the requested capacity as it is now for new FTs and amendments to FTs however Perry will no longer return the note indicating that capacity has been approved This approval is now part of the CAS review process making the return notification redundant Please let me know if you have any questions or comments Dennis

Re Richardson Products Cr Cc correct The system has been updated to reflect volume for August and the term has been extended to Dennis Christine Stokes AM To Ray StellyET NRON Steven HarrisET NRON Kevin HyattET nron TK LohmanET NRON Michelle LokayET nron Dennis LeeET NRON Perry FrazierET NRON cc Subject Richardson Products Cr Please note the following request by Richardson to suspend another month of their contract for the month of August We will have to account for this contract suspension in the August forecast with an estimated loss of MMd days Dennis Our records indicate that the new terminate date should be Lets discuss if you need some documentation to make the system reflect this termination date CS Perry Please verify if your capacity sheets reflect this terminate date as well Thanks Forwarded by Christine StokesETSEnron on AM From Dennis Lee PM To Perry FrazierET NRON Christine StokesET NRON Lorraine LindbergET NRON Jeffery FawcettET NRON Lindy DonohoET NRON Dennis LeeET NRON cc Subject Richardson Products Cr Brad at Richardson advises that he will suspend volumes on CR for the month of August and will extend the term of his contract to October Brad states he will follow up with a written request Dennis

Re TW FT Assignments Cc mentioned contracts have been assigned to Amoco Energy Trading effective We are still working on the name change from Amoco to BP From Michelle Lokay PM To Dennis LeeET NRON cc Lorraine LindbergET NRON Subject TW FT Assignments Documentation for the Southern to BP Energy contract assignments Forwarded by Michelle LokayETSEnron on PM Wadle Rick Rick outhernEnergyCom on PM To Michelle nroncom Michelle nroncom cc Hogan John John outhernEnergyCom Subject TW FT Assignments As per our conversation please assign TW contracts and to BP Energy effective November You may contact Ms Penny Barry at BP Energy for confirmation If you have any additional questions regarding this assignment please call me at Thanks for your help Rick Wadle Sr Gas Control Coordinator Southern Company Energy Marketing

New TW Park Ride Contract Procedure Cc years in the making and includes an all star cast of several but its finally here We have a new way of doing Park Ride Business on TW Over the past month or so I have been working with Morgan Mike Bodnar and Susan Scott to streamline the PNR Process and what follows is the result of this process Effective immediately we will no longer use packets for TW Park Ride All prospective PNR Contracts for TW will be be set up in CBS similar to PNR Master Agreements except that they will include a PNR point and the PNR Template Term will be for one year plus evergreen This should allow reduced paperwork for the shipper as well as the ContractPLE Team and should enhance TWs service to their customers The new procedure is in the Instruction Book on Michelles desk Attached is a copy of the procedure as well as a copy of the PNR contract Let me know if you need clarification of have any questions Dennis X

New TW Park Ride Contract Procedure Cc years in the making and includes an all star cast of several but its finally here We have a new way of doing Park Ride Business on TW Over the past month or so I have been working with Morgan Mike Bodnar and Susan Scott to streamline the PNR Process and what follows is the result of this process Effective immediately we will no longer use packets for TW Park Ride All prospective PNR Contracts for TW will be be set up in CBS similar to PNR Master Agreements except that they will include a PNR point and the PNR Template Term will be for one year plus evergreen This should allow reduced paperwork for the shipper as well as the ContractPLE Team and should enhance TWs service to their customers The new procedure is in the Instruction Book on Michelles desk Attached is a copy of the procedure as well as a copy of the PNR contract Let me know if you need clarification of have any questions Dennis X

ContractsPLE On Call Schedule January through June Attached is the ContractsPLE team oncall schedule for the first half of Please note the following procedural changes for the ContractsPLE on call person The on call person will be the primary contact for questions for all three pipes both contract and capacity release The team member on call for the upcoming weekend will also be the person on call during the week The oncall period starts Monday morning and continues until the next Monday morning The oncall person will be in the office until pm pm during bid week which is the last week of the month If you have any questions or suggestions for improving the process feel free to call Dennis P Lee ETS Gas Logistics

Sending customer information from ENVISION Cc During our Envision training session the question came up as to whether or not we can send documents to our customers from Envision via Email After working with Sylvia Thomas the answer is yes and no Yes we can get documents form Envision to the customer easily No we cant do it through Email Sylvia and her team however are going to look into the possibility of being able to send information from Envision securely through Email In the meantime you can fax information directly from Envision to your customer Directions are attached If you have any questions or problems feel free to call Dennis P Lee ETS Gas Logistics

Re Richardson Products Cr Cc correct The system has been updated to reflect volume for August and the term has been extended to Dennis Christine Stokes AM To Ray StellyET NRON Steven HarrisET NRON Kevin HyattET nron TK LohmanET NRON Michelle LokayET nron Dennis LeeET NRON Perry FrazierET NRON cc Subject Richardson Products Cr Please note the following request by Richardson to suspend another month of their contract for the month of August We will have to account for this contract suspension in the August forecast with an estimated loss of MMd days Dennis Our records indicate that the new terminate date should be Lets discuss if you need some documentation to make the system reflect this termination date CS Perry Please verify if your capacity sheets reflect this terminate date as well Thanks Forwarded by Christine StokesETSEnron on AM From Dennis Lee PM To Perry FrazierET NRON Christine StokesET NRON Lorraine LindbergET NRON Jeffery FawcettET NRON Lindy DonohoET NRON Dennis LeeET NRON cc Subject Richardson Products Cr Brad at Richardson advises that he will suspend volumes on CR for the month of August and will extend the term of his contract to October Brad states he will follow up with a written request Dennis

Notes from April meetingNotes from Contract AdministrationMarketing Discussion April Facilitator Dennis Lee Attendees Elizabeth Brown Michelle Cormier Rick Dietz Lindy Donoho Kevin Hyatt TK Lohman Michelle Lokay Contract Request Forms Requests for new service will go to Marketing Marketing will verify accuracy of request form to ensure that the following minimum requirements are met Shipper Name Shipper Address Phone Number Fax Number State of Incorporation Type of Service IT FT etc Quantity Contract Term Beginning and end dates Receipt Points name Delivery Points name Amendments Marketing will revisit with Legal the issues regarding stacked amendments and capacity In order to facilitate changes in the system Contract Administration will suspend using the amendment number on all amendment letters until the new contract system is in place Dennis and Michelle C will look at internal procedures for amendments and modify as needed to facilitate process CAS Dennis will work with Perry Frazier and Linda Trevino to develop a plan for CAS approval when Perry is not available Transactional Reporting Marketing will provide a deal sheet on any new contract or amendment that is not at max rate so that contact administration can accurately produce the required transactional report Minimum information required on the deal sheet Contract Number if known Rates if onepart need break down of Demand and Commodity Rule of thumb is that commodity will be min rate and remainder will be demand Alternate point information if applicable Glossary of Terms ie R R T Dennis will provide updated Glossary of Terms Tracking Marketing will discuss tracking of contract from request through returned signed contract Contract administration has an internal form for individual contracts but does not track on a spreadsheet Contract Copies Marketing will discuss whether copies are required Josue will not make copies of entire contracts Online contract viewing capabilities through Envision are expected in the future Next Meeting April EB Let me know if I misstated any information of if there is anything I should add Dennis X

New TW Park Ride Contract Procedure Cc years in the making and includes an all star cast of several but its finally here We have a new way of doing Park Ride Business on TW Over the past month or so I have been working with Morgan Mike Bodnar and Susan Scott to streamline the PNR Process and what follows is the result of this process Effective immediately we will no longer use packets for TW Park Ride All prospective PNR Contracts for TW will be be set up in CBS similar to PNR Master Agreements except that they will include a PNR point and the PNR Template Term will be for one year plus evergreen This should allow reduced paperwork for the shipper as well as the ContractPLE Team and should enhance TWs service to their customers The new procedure is in the Instruction Book on Michelles desk Attached is a copy of the procedure as well as a copy of the PNR contract Let me know if you need clarification of have any questions Dennis X

RE Red Rock Admin Contract Cc The contract is set up CR I just need to know what volumes to put in so I can submit it to CAS DL Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Wednesday September PM To Lee Dennis Frazier Perry Betancourt Ramona Kuehl Toby Ratliff Dale Draemer Mary Dunnaway Tina Cc Watson Kimberly Lokay Michelle Subject Red Rock Admin Contract I have run across an issue with the Admin contract Dont worry the overall solution is still good Ive discussed with both Maria and Mary Kay and they both okd again that we can reserve existing capacity for a future expansion and theyre ok with the Admin contract The problem is that the spreadsheet Perry handedout in our meeting yesterday with where when and how much capacity to reserve at Eastend RPs isnt the same as what Michelle thinks is supposed to be reserved Ive been unable to get with Perry yet today to talk with him Im thinking that we need to run another capacity approval on what Michelle would like to have reserved Perrys message says he is out today Im not sure when he will be back My concern is that were running out of time for a Monday implementation if Perry isnt available to resolve this issue If hes in tomorrow we might be able to resolve this in the morning Dennis said it will take him under minutes to enter in the ctrc system But I just wanted to let everyone know there could be another delay I wanted to let Toby know since he was going to put out an announcement Ill update you on the status of this issue tomorrow

ContractsPLE On Call Schedule January through June Attached is the ContractsPLE team oncall schedule for the first half of Please note the following procedural changes for the ContractsPLE on call person The on call person will be the primary contact for questions for all three pipes both contract and capacity release The team member on call for the upcoming weekend will also be the person on call during the week The oncall period starts Monday morning and continues until the next Monday morning The oncall person will be in the office until pm pm during bid week which is the last week of the month If you have any questions or suggestions for improving the process feel free to call Dennis P Lee ETS Gas Logistics
